speed_multiplier_min.description: The value to multiply the projectile speed with when at the smallest charge amount.

speed_multiplier_overcharge.description: The value to multiply the projectile speed with when fully overcharged.

damage_multiplier_min.description: The value to multiply the projectile damage with when at the smallest charge amount.

damage_multiplier_overcharge.description: The value to multiply the projectile damage with when fully overcharged.

penetration_multiplier_min.description: The value to multiply the projectile penetration with when at the smallest charge amount.

penetration_multiplier_overcharge.description: The value to multiply the projectile penetration with when fully overcharged.

distance_multiplier_min.description: The value to multiply the arc distance with when at the smallest charge amount.

distance_multiplier_overcharge.description: The value to multiply the arc distance with when fully overcharged.

extra_arc_splits_min.description: The amount of extra splits this arc can do with minimum charge amount.

extra_arc_splits_overcharge.description: The amount of extra splits this arc can do when fully overcharged.

extra_arc_chains_min.description: The amount of extra chains this arc can do with minimum charge amount.

extra_arc_chains_overcharge.description: The amount of extra chains this arc can do when fully overcharged.
